questions.question: This platform is widely used for developing, shipping, and running applications inside containers.
This open-source system automates the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
This term refers to a lightweight, standalone, executable package that includes everything needed to run a piece of software.
This tool provides container orchestration capabilities for managing containerized applications across multiple hosts.
This term refers to the practice of using containers to package and deploy applications consistently across different environments.
